Textbook: Weir and Vincent (2021)[1]

References

Footnotes

  1. Class Dates: Aug 29, 2022 - Dec 12, 2022↩︎

  2. Students are expected to read and study the assigned chapters prior to attending each class meeting.↩︎

  3. Unless stated otherwise, all assignments are due before class. Refer to the syllabus for assignments detailed information.↩︎
